application.doc: Update the management SSL certificate policy

method.name: POST
method.doc: To update the management SSL certificate with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the management SSL certificate resource URI.

param.name: cert
param.doc: The certificate to import (as a file). Note: The certificate container file must be PKCS12 format (.p12 file) and can contain only a single certificate. This certificate is used as the management SSL certificate.

param.name: password
param.doc: The password of the source certificate container. This parameter is optional.
